sections.heading: Restricting passage over rights-of-way
sections.text: A county may restrict passage over a public right-of-way by resolution or ordinance, provided that the resolution or ordinance sets forth criteria for determining that the restriction is in the public interest. [L 1993, c 113, ยง1]
